description: This file defines a JPA entity class 'Category' representing categories in the recipe backend system, including fields for id, name, and description, along with constraints and annotations for persistence.

classes.description: JPA entity representing recipe categories, with fields for id, name, description, and associated annotations for ORM mapping and validation.
